name: Billy and the Cloneasaurus
description:
During the development of a futuristic amusement park where DINOSAURS are brought to life using advanced cloning techniques, something went wrong...

You are Billy, a plucky young kid who just pulled a golden ticket : You get to be one of the first to see the attractions! However when things begin to unravel, it's up to Billy to survive the horrors of a dinosaur island and make it back to his pal, McGarnagle!

Which path will you choose? Will you survive? Will McGarnagle ever get to finish his lunch? Find out in this exciting adventure, " Billy and the Cloneasaurus! "

- Play a first person perspective and escape an island of DINOSAURS!
- Gamepad/Keyboard and mouse compatible!
- Your choices alter the adventure!
- Simpsons/Jurassic Park inspired story!
- Fullscreen and Windowed versions available for WINDOWS!
